Notes.Text:
This update for libraw fixes the following issues:

- security update
- added patches
  fix CVE-2020-15503 [bsc#1173674], lack of thumbnail size range check can lead to buffer overflow
  + libraw-CVE-2020-15503.patch
Notes.Title: Details

Relationships.RelatesToProductReference: SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 12 SP5
SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 12 SP5

SUSE Linux Enterprise Workstation Extension 12 SP5

Vulnerabilities.Description: LibRaw before 0.20-RC1 lacks a thumbnail size range check. This affects decoders/unpack_thumb.cpp, postprocessing/mem_image.cpp, and utils/thumb_utils.cpp. For example, malloc(sizeof(libraw_processed_image_t)+T.tlength) occurs without validating T.tlength.
